Docs.summary: If user name is null or empty, return null. Else, if the user name is found in the schema, return the user name. Else, if the user name equals the default name return null. Else, throw an error.

static member SaveDataPipe : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Model.RepositoryWriter * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView * bool -> unit

Docs.summary: Save the data pipeline defined by dataPipe. If blankLoader is true or the root IDataView is not an IDataLoader, this persists the root as a BinaryLoader having the same schema.

Docs.summary: Save the model to the output path. The method saves the loader and the transformations of dataPipe and saves optionally predictor and command. It also uses featureColumn, if provided, to extract feature names.
